message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal for both of us.
Your share loses value quickly Alice.  I'm offering a deal where we both benefit significantly.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bigger share.

I'm still hoping for a better deal, inflation is a problem but I won't give up yet.
Alice, every round you wait is costing you thousands!  This offer is more than fair considering the lost value. Take it before it's too late!
